name: testPreviewDescriptionFromConfigurationPage
description: Verify that Folder description is previewed on the Configuration page
descriptionHtml: Verify that Folder description is previewed on the Configuration page

testStage.description: Verify that Folder description is previewed on the Configuration page

steps.name: Click on 'New Item' in the side menu
Click 'Save' button on the BaseConfigPage page
Click 'Logo' button and move to main page
Click on the 'Configure' link on the Folder page
Click on the 'Configure' Button on the Base Job Page
Logout from instance http://localhost:8081/
